rhdx vignette
==============

## Install

Development version from GitLab

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_git("https://gitlab.dickoa/rhdx")
```


```{r, eval = FALSE}
library("rhdx")
```

To set one or both, run:


```{r, eval = FALSE}
# HDX production server
rhdx_setup(hdx_site = "prod", read_only = TRUE)
```
